content: I'll definitely keep an eye out for those deals. Since I need 1,200 points to get 10% off on a new helmet, I'll also make sure to check my REI member dividend card balance regularly. Do you think I should consider purchasing a helmet with MIPS (Multi-Directional Impact Protection System) technology? I've heard it's a game-changer for safety, but I'm not sure if it's worth the extra cost.
